tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces
Interface ICreativeRendition

public interface ICreativeRendition

Interface for creative rendition, only for renderer use by now.

Get width of the rendition.

getPreference

int getPreference()
Get preference of the rendition.

Returns:
an int value, the higher is preferred among all renditions in the creative

setPreference

Set the preference of the duration.

Parameters:
preference - integer, the larger the more preferred

Parameters:
